    import Tracker from 'francy-js/src/tracker/change.js'
    public class | source

    Tracker

    This class holds default methods to handle changes on a model object. It works by the means of a Proxy to track changes and ensures subscribers are notified of these changes on a time basis (1 second default).

    Constructor Summary

    Public Constructor
    public

    constructor(object: object, verbose: *)

    Creates a instance of ModelTracker.

    Method Summary

    Public Methods
    public

    get(target: object, key: object): object

    This method is used by the proxy to get the object being tracked
    public

    set(receiver: object, property: object, value: object): boolean

    This method is used by the proxy to set a property when a change occurs, plus it sets the current object to dirty.
    public

    subscribe(fn: function)

    This method is used register a function that is invoked to sync the object
    public

    sync()

    This method is used to explicitly sync the module with all the subscribers
    public

    unsubscribe(fn: function)

    This method is used unregister a function registered previously

    public set(receiver: object, property: object, value: object): boolean source

    This method is used by the proxy to set a property when a change occurs, plus it sets the current object to dirty.

    This method is used register a function that is invoked to sync the object

    the function to execute - must handle one arg, the object, of type {object}
